mcq.statement: Choose the sentence which is grammatically correct: Until, he came to United State, he didn't knew to cook.

options.a: Until, he came to United State, he didn't knew to cook.
options.b: Until he came to United States, he didn't knew how to cook.
options.c: Until he came to United States, he didn't know to cook.
options.d: Until he came to the United States, he didn't know how to cook.
